com.satori.rtm

Class SubscriptionConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.satori.rtm.SubscriptionConfig

  • public class SubscriptionConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the initial settings for a channel subscription. Includes the method used by Java SDK to resubscribe after the WebSocket connection to the RTM Service drops and the SDK reconnects.

    The Java SDK provides several strategies for resubscribing. See SubscriptionMode.

    You can also define your own strategies with this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubscriptionConfig(java.util.EnumSet<SubscriptionMode> modes, SubscriptionListener listener)
      Creates a subscription configuration to use in channel subscription requests, with a specific subscription modes.

      • setAge

        public SubscriptionConfig setAge(java.lang.Integer age)
        Sets the history age value to use in subscription requests.

        To use this method, set history settings for the channel in the Developer Portal.

        Parameters:
        age - Age value in seconds.
        Returns:
        SubscriptionConfig instance.

      • setCount

        public SubscriptionConfig setCount(java.lang.Integer count)
        Sets the history count value to use in subscription requests.

        To use this method, set history settings for the channel in the Developer Portal.

        Parameters:
        count - Count value.
        Returns:
        SubscriptionConfig instance.

      • setFilter

        public SubscriptionConfig setFilter(java.lang.String filter)
        Sets the filter value for a channel subscription.

        A filter is a statement created with fSQL that defines the filter query to run on the messages published to the channel

        Parameters:
        filter - Filter value.
        Returns:
        SubscriptionConfig instance.

      • setPeriod

        public SubscriptionConfig setPeriod(java.lang.Integer period)
        Sets the period value to use with a filter in a channel subscription.

        The period value is the period of time, in seconds, that the RTM Service runs the filter on channel messages before it sends the result to the client application

        Parameters:
        period - Period value.
        Returns:
        SubscriptionConfig instance.
